name: The Unspoken Farewell: Eislyn x EraLore

metadata.name: The Unspoken Farewell: Eislyn x EraLore
metadata.description:
"The Captain put his arm behind Lucia. “Lucia, love.” A tender look nearly froze time around them. Their unspoken farewell filled the air with silence, despite being encapsulated by the stirring sounds of waves."


Eislyn loves creating art to bring NFTs, stories, & worlds to life! She currently has two collections: custom made portraits tailored to the holder & a collection of friendly squirrels that are featured in stories & games created just for them! Find her on twitter @eislyn_eth.
